Title: Built-In Scalar SQL Functions
Description:
The glob(X,Y) function is equivalent to the
  expression "Y GLOB X".
  Note that the X and Y arguments are reversed in the glob() function
  relative to the infixGLOBoperator.  Y is the string and X is the
  pattern.  So, for example, the following expressions are equivalent:If thesqlite3_create_function()interface is used to
  override the glob(X,Y) function with an alternative implementation then
  theGLOBoperator will invoke the alternative implementation.
